text:
REFERSION | NEW YORK, NY | PHP DEVELOPER | FULL-TIME | ONSITE

Profitable and have never raised any money. A company built by developers and people who love tech. We are a small, empowered, self-motivated team that can do big things. Our server stacks run PHP, MySQL, GraphQL, Serverless functions, React.js, ElastiCache, and others. If you're an intelligent developer who believes in doing what is best for the product, you'll love our team.

APPLY AT: https://refersion.workable.com/jobs/884773
